metadata.title: CVE-2021-22181 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A denial of service vulnerability in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionssince 11.8 allows an attacker to create a recursive pipeline relationshipand exhaust resources.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
